original_title: No LP gas price revision, says Litro
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas announced on Friday (4) that there will be no revision in the prices of cooking gas in Sri Lanka.

Litro Chairman Muditha Peiris told reporters that given the world market prices, a price hike of Rs. 470/- should be imposed, however, Litro would refrain from increasing the prices of domestic LP gas products.

Pakistan PM to dissolve Parliament on August 9 ahead of October elections
Nigerian President asks Senate to support possible military action against neighbouring Niger
